pr_title: DEV-1525 Publish datatypes for all files used in re-runs

timeline.message:
DEV-1525 Publish datatypes for all files used in re-runs

Generally follows the pattern laid out for crams, with a few changes.

Linking to sample is combined with datatype linking, we always need a sample to look it up.

Path construction done in the AddDatatypeToFile class to prevent mistakes and duplication.

Test added, still WIP.

DEV-1525 Add tests for further operations

Adds a simple check for whether a stages operations match the expected.

Still not possible for stages with state (germline, structural, sage).

timeline.bodyText: This is an opportunity to loosen the allowable response codes so we can make the API return a more standard response.
timeline.author: nedleitch
